message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business. Given its high quality and unique features, we are confident it will be a valuable addition to your operations. We are offering this exceptional product for $2000000.
Alice,  while I appreciate your offer,  $2000000 is well above my budget.  I'm interested in this product, but I'm only able to offer $1000000 at this time. Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value of our product and its potential impact on your business, I understand your current budget constraints. I would like to propose a compromise of $1500000 for the product. This price reflects the quality and benefits it offers, while also being more accessible to your current financial situation. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with this exciting opportunity.

Alice,  while I appreciate you moving closer to my initial offer, $1500000 is still a bit more than I'm able to commit to at this time.  Given the value I see in your product, I'm willing to go up to $1200000.  I believe this is a fair price considering the potential benefits this product will bring.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. Based on our discussions, I am prepared to offer the product to you for $1300000. This price reflects a balance between the value of the product and your budgetary considerations. I believe this offer provides a mutually beneficial solution for both of us.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $1300000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us. I'm willing to offer $1100000 for the product. This is a significant commitment for me, and I believe it reflects the true value of the product.

I understand your position, Bob, and I respect your valuation of our product. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer the product to you for $1200000. This price is reflective of the value it brings to your business and aims to meet your budgetary constraints. I believe this is a fair compromise that allows us to move forward with confidence.
